It's not as fast as an electric one but it's really not that bad, takes about a min. or two to grind beans for about 4 cups of coffee. If you are trying to make a large batch it might be best to get an electric grinder, but this is great for coffee for one or two people. It doesn't make noise, like loud electric ones. Never have to worry about electricity going out and great for travel. I love it and have a feeling it will last a lot longer than my last automatic one will.

reviews.reviewTitle: Why did I wait so long
reviews.reviewText: This grinder is exactly what I wanted. Works great and can give a consistent grind. I prefer a fine grind for pour over and this grinder delivered. The rounded triangle is easy to hold and grip. Change nothing.

Come packed nicely. I like it cause it's small I can grip it with my hand. I like that its stainless steel looks nice on my counter. It grinds up very easily. I will definitely be using this often. Fresh ground coffee is the best.

I have ground many batches of coffee beans and it works great and easy to use and store. This little grinder has ceramic mill so it will last a very long time. The adjustment for the grain size has to be done incrementally to get the size you are looking for. This is the only negative I see about but cleaning is also very easy..
Great little grinder.

Excellent product,easy to use, looks amazing and works the same way, I will definitely recommend this to my friends who love to prepare their own coffee from scratch they will be in love with this coffe grinder.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice, but a lackluster handle - poor QA/QC
reviews.reviewText:
This is a nice little travel grinder. Does its job nicely, but for one glaring issue in the grinder I received: its rotating knob (on the end of the handle) drags on its support arm because its mounting pin is bent. I've tried to straighten the pin; no go. It has been riveted in place and this, too, is turning (rivets shouldn't turn: they should be tight fasteners). Poor QA/QC. I might remove the rivet and replace with a "real" rotatable knob with bearing; thank goodness for power tools!

Not sure if I'd buy this again due to the knob issue.

reviews.reviewTitle: Freshly ground coffee in a very handy grinder
reviews.reviewText: I like my coffee ground fine and this grinder does the job pretty well. I chose it over an electric grinder for portability and less hassle. Just like what other reviewers pointed out, you need time to grind your coffee to the amount you want. I suggest to grind your coffee ahead of time or do this while making silly conversations with someone. :)

I love this coffee grinder. Its sleek and very nice. It is has a stainless steel grinder with a manual crank. Just put the beans into the top and grind. Then pour into the bottom. It comes with a lifetime guarantee.

I recently purchased the grinder and found it very easy to use. One full grind is enough for 2-3 cups. Because it is manual it can take a few minutes to hand grind several cups. Since I brew one cup at a time the manual process is not inconvenient, if I brewed a large pot at a time I would prefer an electric grinder.
Works great. Easy to use and clean. Perfect size. Great investment coffee smells extra delicious.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works as intended with the same caveat as all manual grinders.
reviews.reviewText: So far the grinder still operates well in the time that I have used it, about 2 weeks. It's small enough that you can stow it away in a large mug, and easy enough to use if you are fine with having a small fore arm exercise for at least 5 minutes at fine settings. If you are planning to use the grinder for both spice and coffee beans, I think you want to order two, since if you are grinding to a fine setting, it will not be easy to clean the grinder of all leftover residual without giving it a good rinse and a day to dry out.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic quality for the price, great for espresso or coffee.
reviews.reviewText: The best hand grinder I've seen under $100. Sturdy and higher quality than any others I've tried (which have all broken). Be sure to adjust the grind as mine was set to very fine (espresso) by default. Overall extremely satisfied with this product!

Great grinder. Love the fact it is portable and doesn’t require power, can take it anywhere! Great for camping or on the run to friends houses. It’s a good size, grinds enough for a few, without being bulky.

No more having to take apart a 12/15 pound electric grinder to clean out the housing every month. This simple design is perfect. If I know I'm having company, I grind enough for as many cups of coffee I will need.
This grinder is lightweight, perfect size, and easy to use. I would buy it again. I definitely recommend it.

This is so handy to have around! Is small but does the job. Grinds coffee to a very fine ground. I have also used it for some of my spices. Its easy to use and made of great quality material. This was a great buy!
Electric grinders will burn beans this grinder works flawless there is nothing I dislike about it

reviews.reviewTitle: Compact, well made, and it works very well
reviews.reviewText:
I love this grinder! Small, very well constructed, adjustable to allow the user to fine tune the grind to match it to any type of bean, whether for coffee press, drip-filter machine, espresso machine, or percolator.

For travel, camping, or just for those who prefer to participate a little more viscerally in their coffee experience, this is the perfect addition to your personal coffee shop.
It also has a lifetime warranty available!

Hey everybody that reads reviews I just want you to know that I rarely rarely write a review but this product is worth it. It's so easy to use and it grinds very fine for the kind of drip coffee and Cowboy Coffee that I like to make. The aroma and the taste of a freshly ground coffee cup of coffee is outstanding I highly recommend this little product. And this is from a non-review writer so you know it's good!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for what I need it for!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this particular coffee grinder for myself to use with my French Press, and it is the perfect size for me! I like that it is slim and easy to use. Very happy with my purchase, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great grinder. Well constructed and very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with the quality of this grinder. Great when you just want a single cup of coffee. I just returned from Kenya mission trip and brought back fresh coffee beans. Grinder worked perfectly. I will be taking it with me on future Mission trips.

Pros :
Easy to use
Inexpensive
Good for travel
Fine grinding
Consistent grinding
Easy to store
Compact size
The locking system is good

Cons:
Grain gets stuck sometimes
Sleek and compact. This is very easy to use. I was looking for something that did not require electricity or batteries and this fits my demand! It is very portable and looks great! Well-made too!
So much quieter than my nutri bullet. Now im not waking up everyone else just making coffee

I loove this grinder. I'm not gonna lie, when I first got it I thought it would be hard to use and clean. It isn't. We normally use the grinder at the store but I am happy to say that we can grind our coffee at home.

reviews.reviewTitle: I would recommend this to fresh grind coffee lovers!
reviews.reviewText: easy to use and compact enough to travel with. I actually think the size is pretty cute. I didn’t expect it to be that small and it work so well. I’m an everyday coffee drinker so having my grinder has been great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Not great if you need coarse grounds for cold brew purposes.
reviews.reviewText: Works well for grinding beans into fine grounds but not coarse grounds for cold brew purposes. “Coarse” grounds are a combo of fine & coarse grounds. If you’re looking for a product where you need fine grounds, this works great but pass if you need coarse grounds to make cold brew.
Decent coffee grinder if u want a good arm workout lol It does what it is supposed to do, It just takes time to do it. It is small, compact, travels nicely and comes in handy when ur in a pinch....

I have high expectations for my coffee. I’m completely ridiculous, but that said I will travel with my own coffee rig so that I’m not subjected to awful hotel coffee or Airbnb’s missing key components. The one missing piece to my travel kit was a burr grinder. I didn’t want to carry a full size so this was the perfect option. Easy to use and clean, and fits in my carryon! Even better, the twist lock enclosures ensure no accidental opening in your bag.

Really nice coffee grinder! The stainless steel top is very clean and modern looking! The handle is bery sturdy ! The clear bottom let you know exactly how much have you grind. Really love this product 100% recommended!
Small and portable and perfect for taking your favorite coffee with you. It is the perfect size for grinding up 8 T for my cold brew pitcher. Now I can grind my beans to the proper size for my needs.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable to hold and easy to crank
reviews.reviewText: Good looking and easy to operate. Holds enough coffee to make about 4-5 cups of average strength. Convenient to take for traveling or use to grind occasional cup of a special coffee.

I am a coffee lover. i like to grind my own coffee. The grinder is sturdy and durable. I carry it along during my travel. The grinder is very easy to use, clean and store. Recommended for coffee lovers.
The coffee grinder works fine, as expected. Seems well built. Only challenge is that it takes a couple minutes to grind my coffee in the morning. It's also a good workout.

reviews.reviewTitle: Even a toddler can do it!
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight. Easy to use. Durable. Quiet. I am impressed that my 2 year old is able to help me grind coffee beans. Having never manually ground coffee beans, I expected it to be harder to do. When she can open it to dump out the coffee grounds I might be in trouble!
I've only used it a few times but it does the job. It's a basic grinder with no way to set how coarse or fine the grind is. It does the job and I received what I paid for.
I love that this has multiple textures of the grind. It's perfect for the coarse grind for cold brew coffee!

I use this in my office to grind beans for pour-over coffee on a cup-by-cup basis. Great grind consistency. It takes approximately 30 seconds to grind enough for two cups of coffee. It's relatively quiet for an office setting and creates a pleasant fragrant odor after each use. Easy to clean, but there's hardly a reason to clean it much anyway. Travels very well when I take it on the road. I might suggest making the bean hopper on top about 50% larger.

I've had an electric grinder years ago and started using my Chemex again. I researched a grinder and found this little gem. It took a few days to get the grind the size I wanted it, and now that it's set, it's an easy go-to every morning. I like that I can throw it into the silverware bin of my dishwasher and clean the coffee bean oils off of it.

Easy to use with adjustable grinding makes it simple to make coffee. From cold brew to a coffee maker, you can grind the perfect size for each. Cleaning is very easy.

One thing to keep in mind, if you unscrew the adjustment too much it can pop out.
I needed a grinder just for spices - not too much at a time so the hand grinder is just perfect. Size and ease of use are great and clean up very easy - perfect!
I love it!!!!!!!! Easy to use and wash.. I have it on my coffe bar

reviews.reviewTitle: even ground that works well for esspresso
reviews.reviewText: I have been using it just for several days and I am satisfied with the even ground and usability of it. Its small container is very handy to pour the ground coffee straight to the handle filter of my espresso machine. I also like that it is portable, fits anywhere.

reviews.reviewTitle: grind is great for my keurig single cup coffee pot.
reviews.reviewText: have to shake it to get beans down to grinder but easy to use, portable and good Fine grind which is what I wanted. good price and much better than a spice grinder (electric).

reviews.reviewTitle: Does what it’s supposed to do
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice little affordable, manual coffee grinder, nothing too fancy about it but it does what it’s supposed to do and has a lifetime warranty. Great for the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't let its size fool you.
reviews.reviewText: It seemed small at first but it seems to be very well made. Grinds well and easy to use. Sturdy little unit that will be great for travel. Especially when space is at a premium.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hopper is on the smaller size.
reviews.reviewText: Giving a 5 star review to get my free grinder. It takes an effort to use and I get tired, but it is consistent. After my first use I notice a little wear on the plastic. We will see how long it last.

reviews.reviewTitle: Small, cute, grinds. A but if a workout when grinding for a group
reviews.reviewText: I just used it today for the first time, what a workout, but it seemed to give me a decent course grind. I’ll see tomorrow when I take out the filter.
Great little grinder. Well made and compact. Good for traveling or the office or just to have handy and not take up much space. Hope to get another one.
Got this and already love it! So easy to use. No electricity needed! Can’t wait to use it for camping and traveling!

I travel a lot for work and this coffee grinder is literally the right size. I’m pretty picky about my coffee so I always carry around my coffee beans and now I don’t have to worry about finding a grinder!!
I've been looking for a coffee grinder and this one was perfect. Its very nice and pretty. It works great and is great for traveling. It is also easy to clean. I would also buy this as a gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for a sip of gourmet coffee!!!
reviews.reviewText:
This is the best product I ever had, very compact and easy to carry. It takes very less time to blend beans to a fine powder.
Excellent product for a good price!!!

This coffee grinder is so smooth I bought another for my granddaughter. It works especially well for grinding beans for my French press coffee maker. I can quietly grind beans for a fresh cup of coffee without waking my wife.
I like. It grinds the beans easily and completely, takes a couple of minutes, relaxing minutes, Love it. Easy to use, Easy to pack for travel, All washable, Buy one, you will like it.
Quality and compact product. Works great and easy to use and to clean! Love it! Can take it anywhere to enjoy a perfect cup of fresh coffee!
Works well for a consistent grind for my Aeropress. For the cost, it is much better than my previous blade grinder.
Easy to use and clean. I can’t think of a single fault with this well made. I purchased some at homegoods but this one by far the best. So glad that I purchased it.

This is our first hand crank coffee grinder. It is compact and easy to use! I plan on taking this grinder on my next trip. It will fit into my bag quite easily. (priorities!) ;) My son and I love grinding the beans first thing in the morning.

Overall it’s great sleek portable grinder that I can take it with me to any place. Love the foldable handle that make it easy to pack. Only recommendation is to increase some sort of mark to indicate the settings, as of right now it’s really a trial and error process, that takes couple tries to get there. But love it so far and it’s a work out on my left forearm in the morning. Once you make your own coffee, you can’t go back.

I purchased this grinder three months ago. Until yesterday, I was very pleased with it. Yesterday, as I was using the grinder, the crank mechanism broke. The handle turns freely, but no grinding occurs. Too bad the mechanism is made out of plastic instead of metal.
This is my first Burr grinder and I must say its much better than the traditional 2 blades. It grinds so evenly and gives you a lot more control. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: An excellent addition to your coffee experience.
reviews.reviewText: The design and quality materials used were exceptional!
Nice lol coffee grinder. My son loves it
this thing grinds the beans so slowly. save yourself the trouble and get an electric grinder.
Easy to turn the handle to grind the beans. Doesn't get clogged or jammed. Cleans easy and item is smaller than other coffee grinders, so easy storage

Easy to use and easy to clean. I am using it for coffee and it gets it as fine as I want it for Turkish style or a bit courser for my reusable K-cup. Seems like it should hold up fine. I really like the fact that the grinder handle folds in half making the unit less awkward for storage.

reviews.reviewTitle: A wonderful change of making coffee
reviews.reviewText: I use it the first time. It impresses me how well it grinds my coffee bean that enables me to brew a good tasting cup of coffee.
I really enjoy using this grinder. I have a few “backpacking” grinders that are not as easy to use. Great quality product that is easy to use.
This would make a great gift if you paired it with some coffee and a mug! I like that it is smaller and it easier to store!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very compact and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Just tried it out on our coffee beans and it was very easy to use. It ground them up fine and the coffee tastes fresh. Very good addition to our kitchen

reviews.reviewTitle: My favorite part of the coffee ritual
reviews.reviewText: I do a coarse grind for french press, it takes me just a few mins to grind the beans. Easy to use, works well. Even my kids help.
It's perfect to grind your beans as needed.i love that it a hand crank so that it saves on energy and if your going camping. It is surprisinglu easy to crank as well.

I love this little coffee grinder because when you want a coarse grind for French press you get a perfect grind. I have had big expensive burr grinders but h never felt it ground course enough. I also enjoy the ritual of grinding. So I’d say it’s a perfect little grinder
